Olivier Assayas' film stars Asia Argento as a woman who had a relationship with Michael Madsen. River Queen attempts to pack a complicated, sweeping, historical narrative into just under two hours. There are some breathtaking battle scenes and the Wanganui scenery is beautiful, but the crowning descision made by director Vincent Ward is the complete lack of subtitles for any of this movie's non-English dialogue. Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless action film. In Canada stopping for gasoline, Joe goes to the Palace Pet Shop across the street and rescues a cat called Summon (beginning to sound familiar?).
